name: Someone's Missing
description:
This game was made for the "Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper" Game Jam.

Thig game involves you getting kidnapped, and placed on a trolley going down to your doom! The only way to escape, find who's missing.

If you haven't played before, please consider viewing the tutorial.

Controls:

Mouse - Interact

Escape / Backspace / Space - Pause
